message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15,000. It's in excellent condition and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can't pay more than $12,000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement closer to my budget.

Bob, I understand your position. While $12,000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,500. This reflects the value I've placed on the product and gives us both a fair deal.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $12,800 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our budget.
